channel.title: Linux on Jincheng Li
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Jincheng Li

item.title: What Really Goes on in a Computer
item.description: I wanted to start a series of posts on how the Linux operating system works, inspired by linux-insides, but instead of covering the entire operating system which is way too much work for my lazy ass, I’ll just focus on several aspects of the OS which I find very interesting and may have taken me more time to grasp compared to other things. My motivation for doing this is mainly to learn more about Linux and fill in any knowledge gaps I have.
